sqlMap.insert: insert into note (note_no, note_send, note_title, note_content, note_sdate, note_edate, note_status, mem_id) values (note_seq.nextval, #note_send#, #note_title#, #note_content#, sysdate, sysdate, #note_status#, #mem_id#)
sqlMap.select: select * from note where mem_id=#mem_id# order by note_no desc
select * from note where note_send=#note_send# order by note_no desc
select * from note where mem_id=#mem_id# order by note_no desc
select * from note where note_no=#no# and mem_id=#id#
select * from note where note_no=#no# and note_send=#id#
sqlMap.update: update note set note_status=1 where note_no=#note_no#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from note where mem_id=#mem_id# and note_status=0
select A.* from (select rownum as rnum , B.* from (select * from note order by note_no desc) B) A where rownum <= #end# and A.rnum >= #start#
sqlMap.insert: insert into join_withme (join_no, join_grade, p_name, join_date, withme_code) values (join_withme_seq.nextval, 0, #p_name#, sysdate, #withme_code#)
